attributes.action: ensure that our country remains a Christian country run by Godly men and women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned feel that our country, a Chritian country, is becoming far too multi-cultural. We are in no way racist and welcome other races to the United Kingdom. However, our country is a Christian country and should remain that way. We put it to you that people immigrating from other countries should be made to adjust to our culture and religion as we have to in their home lands.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
